Cutie jumps out of the way having one hit his ankle
and the rest miss (hey it wouldn't be any fun if he
lost his gun his to old to fight hand to hand). He was
on the ground and couldn't get up. In desperation he
sent out another message:

My name is Cutie. Any Maximal who hears this HELP ME!

Cutie: It isn't to late to walk away from this. How
much longer could I live anyway. And if you want to
destroy a bot why not slag yourself. For pities sake
just leave me alone. What faction are you with? Are
you even from Cybertron? Do you even have a spark(only
half joking)?

He aimed his gun and fired 8 shots just trying to hold
the enemy at bay.

OOC: Is there a reason why I lost both of my first 2
battles?
